description.value:
Activate A (manipulate)

Once you imbibe this bitter elixir, your skin exudes a toxin for 1 hour, affecting any creature that hits you with a jaws Strike or other bite attack. If you are Swallowed Whole by another creature, they are automatically exposed to the poison every round and take a â€“2 penalty to their saving throw against it.

Frogskin Tincture Poison (poison)

Saving Throw @Check[type:fortitude|dc:22]

Maximum Duration 6 rounds

Stage 1 @Damage[2d4[poison]] damage (1 round)

Stage 2 @Damage[2d6[poison]] damage and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 2} (1 round)

Stage 3 @Damage[3d6[poison]] damage, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 3}, and @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Sickened]{Sickened 1} (1 round)
